message: Let's split it fairly, Bob! 60-40 seems reasonable.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my best offer so far.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than last time. Let's meet in the middle?
I'm not willing to give you more than 30% of the total, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle on the 700k mark.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I need a better deal than 22%. Can you meet me at 25%?
I'm not budging on the 80% mark, but I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share than last time. Take it or leave it.
I'm really struggling to make ends meet. Can we try to find a way to make this work?
